name: Common Dirt
desc: Just some dirt, no big deal.

name: Tough Clay
desc: Tough clay, not good for much.

name: Quality Topsoil
desc: The good stuff; great for gardens.

name: Soft Clay
desc: Soft, smooth clay; great for ceramics.

name: Gravel
desc: Tiny rocks, good for cheap driveways/parking lots.

name: Small Stones
desc: Small, smooth rocks. Would look nice in a garden.

name: Large Stones
desc: Large, heavy stones. Could have decorative uses?

name: Huge Stones
desc: Very large stones. Can probably be used in sculpture.

name: Boulder
desc: A huge rock; not much you can do with it but break it.
